description:
Greetings Brothers & Sisters,

Since the beginning of our time-space matrix, mankind has been at war with an invisible enemy. The Initiate's Flame has been suppressed, yet it shall never be extinguished. Humanity is being called back to LOVE & UNITY CONSCIOUSNESS, regardless of our color, creed or class. Our collective is now in awareness of being presented with the “Red Pill” granting us an opportunity to direct the course of our Earth into a higher timeline.

This is a call to action for humanity to open the doors to New Earth through active awareness, intention & clear vision to arrive at our destination of THE GREAT AWAKENING. ***DISCLAIMER: THIS IS DEEP AND POTENTIALLY DISTURBING AWAKENING INFORMATION BEYOND THE SURFACE LEVEL, THIS CONCERNS THE HISTORY OF OUR PLANET AND LITERAL SPIRITUAL WARFARE BEING PRESENTLY WAGED AGAINST HUMANITY. VIEW WITH AN OPEN MIND, USE DISCERNMENT, AND RATHER THAN CONTEST INFORMATION - DO YOUR OWN RESEARCH!*** A live stream broadcast by @awakenedconsciouscollective will be hosted on IG at 7PM PST 6.3.2020.

Please forward this Message to as many people as possible (Including the photo & caption) so we can continue to share the truth in the face of unjust censorship. *REPOST - SHARE - TAG 3 PEOPLE READY TO AWAKEN.* The New Earth we've been envisioning comes true. Dream Wisely. - 5D
🌐
#Meditate #WakeUp #TheMatrix #TheGreatAwakening #Disclosure #Spiritual #Mindfulness #BlackLivesMatter #Meditation #LightWorkers #5D #NewEarth
